## Stone Cold Classic stats

```{r, fig.width=15, fig.height=5}
SPX_mid_rates %>%
  select(timestamp, mid_price) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = timestamp, y = mid_price)) +
  geom_line() + 
  scale_color_gdocs() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.title=element_blank()) +
  labs(y = "SPX")
```

```{r}
stats <- matrix(NA, 3, 9)
stats[1, ] <- getStatsSingle(SPX_mid_rates$rate * 252 * 405)
stats[2, ] <- getStatsSingle(SPX_mid_rates$adjRate * 252 * 405)
stats[3, ] <- getStatsSingle(SPX_mid_rates$r)

stats %>%
  as.data.frame(row.names = c("stopy zwrotu", "nadwyżkowe stopy zwrotu", "LIBOR3M USD")) %>%
  kable("latex",
        booktabs = T,
        caption = "Statystyki opisowe stóp zwrotu SPX i stopy procentowej LIBOR3M USD",
         digits = 2,
         col.names = statsNames)  %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 7)

```
